error.signature: Error: Backend configuration changed: backend migration is required
error.regex: (Backend configuration changed|backend migration .+ required|Error migrating state|failed to migrate state|Backend reinitialization required)

verdict.summary: Terraform backend configuration changed and state needs to be migrated to the new backend.

dead_ends.action: Delete the .terraform directory and reinitialize without migrating
dead_ends.why_fails: Skipping migration loses the existing state file, making Terraform think no resources exist

dead_ends.action: Manually copy the state file to the new backend location
dead_ends.why_fails: Manual copies miss metadata, may corrupt state, and do not handle locking correctly

workarounds.action: Run terraform init -migrate-state to properly migrate state to the new backend
workarounds.how: terraform init -migrate-state will prompt to copy existing state to the new backend configuration

workarounds.action: Use terraform init -reconfigure if you intentionally want a fresh state
workarounds.how: terraform init -reconfigure reinitializes the backend without migrating state (use only if state in new backend is correct)
